full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: Air Data Acquisition

**Reference Number**: cb-407-10923832

## Tender Overview

The Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) is seeking a contractor to provide data requirements regarding air fares, flight operations, passengers, operations, fleet, and financial data. The contract is expected to commence on April 1st, 2024, and end on March 31st, 2025.

## Description of the Service Required

The CTA is responsible for regulating different modes of transportation in Canada, including air, rail, and marine. To support its functions, the CTA requires a reliable data analytics system to conduct research and analysis on transportation trends and risks. The contractor will be responsible for providing:

* Air Fare Data on Canadian and foreign air carriers to inform regulatory impact assessments and industry studies
* Flight Data on Canadian and foreign air carriers to assess compliance with new regulations
* Passenger Data on Canadian and foreign air carriers to classify carriers under regulations and perform industry analysis
* Operations Data on Canadian air carriers to identify large and small transportation providers
* Air Carrier Fleet Data on Canadian air carriers to inform compliance monitoring and promotion
* Financial Data on foreign air carriers to assess their impact on the Canadian air industry

## Tender Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

The CTA will evaluate proposals based on a combination of technical merit and price. Interested contractors must submit a proposal that outlines their method of data collection, analysis, and reporting. The evaluation criteria will focus on the proposal's technical accuracy, data quality, and compliance with regulations.

## Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: March 17th, 2024, at 3:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1st, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31st, 2025

## How to Submit a Proposal

Contractors interested in submitting a proposal must access the Canadian Government's procurement portal at [www.tender.gov.gc.ca](http://www.tender.gov.gc.ca). The portal contains a full copy of the tender notice and instructions on how to submit a proposal. Contact Nancy Trepanier at [otc.soumission-bid.cta@otc-cta.gc.ca](mailto:otc.soumission-bid.cta@otc-cta.gc.ca) for any questions or concerns. 

Please note that some Canadian languages and terms may be included in the added text above; however, I translated them manually and lack native skills to ensure 100%
